availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elias Hubbard Smith (Grant County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Williamstown, Grant County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Sallie C. Oâ€™Hara Smith in Grant County, Kentucky, on July 11, 1850. Father of Helen M. Smith, Lucy R. Smith, Kate Smith, and James W. Smith. Clerk in Grant County in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Williamstown in 1850. Attorney in Grant County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Williamstown in 1860. Attorney in Grant County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
